title: Stablecoin Surge Could Trigger $1T Exit From Emerging Market Banks: Standard Chartered
contentSnippet: Rising stablecoin usage could offer savers in weak economies a safer alternative to local banks.

title: Bitcoin is crushing top memecoins in 2025: Can DOGE, TRUMP rebound in Q4?
contentSnippet: Dogecoin price fell 20% in 2025, while Shiba Inu, PEPE, and TRUMP have plunged even further as Bitcoin outperformed the memecoin market.

title: $46B poured into stablecoins last quarter: Here’s who took the lead
contentSnippet: Stablecoins added $46 billion in Q3 net supply, led by USDT, USDC and USDe. Find out who gained share, where funds flowed and what signals matter next.

title: Grayscale launches staking for Ethereum and Solana ETPs in US first
contentSnippet: Grayscale becomes the first US crypto fund issuer to launch staking for its Ethereum and Solana exchange-traded products.

title: Grayscale Adds Staking to Ethereum and Solana Investment Products in U.S. First
contentSnippet: The update applies to Grayscale's Ethereum Trust ETF, Ethereum Mini Trust ETF, and Solana Trust, which have a combined $8.25 billion in assets under management.

title: Crypto funds smash records with $5.95B inflows amid shutdown concerns
contentSnippet: Crypto ETPs posted a record $5.95 billion of inflows last week, with Bitcoin leading the gains, recording a record $3.6 billion in inflows amid concerns about a US government shutdown.

title: Bitcoin's ATH Brings Firepower for Bulls With One Caveat: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 6, 2025

title: Galaxy Debuts Crypto Platform for Individuals to Rival Robinhood, Kraken
contentSnippet: The firm has a history of servicing financial institutions.

title: Mike Novogratz’s Galaxy launches GalaxyOne, offering 4% yields on cash
contentSnippet: Originally developed under the name Fierce, GalaxyOne is designed for individual investors seeking exposure to both TradFi and digital markets.

title: Bitcoin’s $125K Resistance: Analyst Warns Failure Could Bring Bear Market
contentSnippet: Ledn CIO John Glover warns that failing to surpass the $125,000 resistance could trigger a bear market.

title: Bitcoin's Rally Tightens Its Grip on Crypto Markets: Is Alt Season Cancelled?
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin's rally pushes dominance to 59%, experts see altseason delayed but not cancelled, pending a market rotation.

title: Japan’s new PM may be a boon for risk assets, crypto markets
contentSnippet: Japan’s new prime minister may drive a renewed wave of risk appetite among Japanese crypto investors, industry watchers told Cointelegraph.

title: BTC October price breakout odds low: 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
contentSnippet: Bitcoin reached a new all-time high, but an AI-based model predicted that a historic BTC price breakout was unlikely to occur in October.

title: BNB Tops $1.2K in 4% Rally as Chain Activity and Institutional Demand Accelerate
contentSnippet: The BNB Chain saw a surge in active addresses and decentralized trading, with the Aster Protocol's total value locked jumping 570% to $2.34 billion.

title: No companies apply for Vietnam crypto pilot amid high barriers
contentSnippet: Vietnam’s crypto pilot gets no takers, with steep capital rules and bans on stablecoins and tokenized securities limiting interest.

title: China Financial Leasing Group to Raise $11M for Crypto Investment
contentSnippet: China Financial will raise the capital through a new share subscription, issuing over 69 million new shares at a price of 1.25 Hong Kong dollars each.

title: AI and HPC Hype Fuels Pre-Market Rally in Bitcoin (BTC) Mining Stocks
contentSnippet: Bitcoin treasury stocks are lagging, however, despite BTC trading above $124K.

title: XRP Volumes on Aster DEX Mimic Those on Binance, Raising Questions About Market Frenzy
contentSnippet: DefiLlama delisted Aster’s perpetuals data after its founder flagged suspicious correlations in XRP trading volumes, raising questions about how one of crypto’s most active markets is being reported.

title: Polymarket Bettors Say U.S. Government Shutdown Will be Long But Won't Break Records
contentSnippet: Bettors predict it will last longer than Oct. 15, but won't break the record set by the first Trump administration in 2018-2019.

title: Elon Musk’s answer to ‘falsehoods’ —Grokipedia will be out in 2 weeks
contentSnippet: Elon Musk announced that the first beta for Grokipedia, xAI’s answer to platforms such as Wikipedia, will launch in two weeks.

title: Unity patches Android mobile bug, says no evidence of exploit
contentSnippet: Unity has patched a vulnerability discovered in June that allowed malicious code execution in Android games, which could be used to target crypto users.

title: DAT企業資産が20兆円規模に拡大も懸念浮上、ボラティリティ依存が課題＝VanEckレポート
contentSnippet: VanEckは最新レポートでDAT企業の保有資産が20兆円規模に拡大したと報告した。ブームが継続する中、レポートはボラティリティ依存型のDAT企業の戦略の持続可能性に懸念を表明した。

title: スタンダードチャータード銀、2025年末にビットコイン20万ドル予想を維持
contentSnippet: スタンダード・チャータード銀行が仮想通貨ビットコインの2025年末価格を20万ドルと予想している。ETF流入と米政府閉鎖を上昇要因に挙げた。

title: ビットコイン史上最高値更新、独歩高の背景に強気の投資家態度｜仮想NISHI
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ビットコインは5日、史上最高値を更新した。金融市場全体における「脱中央集権的リスクヘッジ資産」としてのBTC存在感を際立たせている。

title: メタマスク、最大級のオンチェーン報酬プログラムを開始へ　独自トークンとも関連か
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨ウォレットのメタマスクが大規模報酬プログラムを予定している。シーズン1のみで45億円相当のLINEA配布を予定し、独自トークンとの連携も示唆されている。

title: Donald Trump and Bitcoin: From 'Not a Fan' to Crypto President
contentSnippet: President Trump used to slam Bitcoin as "a scam." Now he's back in the White House and making crypto moves for both himself and the U.S.

title: The Best Nintendo Switch 2 Games to Play Right Now

title: 'Sell Shovels': This Firm Makes Dashboards for Strategy and Dozens of Bitcoin Treasuries
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin treasury firms proliferate in the U.S., an engineer-by-day is building dashboards for them on the other side of the world.

title: Bitcoin Hits New All-Time High Price Above $125,000
contentSnippet: The leading digital asset as been on a tear in 2025. How high can it go?

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、BTC20万ドル到達分析や米国でXRPなどのETF個別申請が不要になど
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナといった主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: ビットコイン1700万円台後半に回復、米政府機関閉鎖で逃避資金流入｜bitbankアナリスト寄稿
contentSnippet: 今週のビットコイン円相場は1775万円周辺まで反発。米政府機関閉鎖による逃避資金流入と利下げ期待の復活が支援材料に。ドル建て12万ドル回復で史上最高値更新の可能性を解説。

title: 週刊ニュース｜自称IQ276投資家のBTCへの全財産転換やポケカ等のトークン化トレンド分析に高い関心
contentSnippet: 今週は、自称IQ276の投資家によるビットコインへの全財産転換、米政府閉鎖による仮想通貨ETF承認手続き停滞、バイナンスによるビッグトレンド分析に関する記事が最も関心を集めた。

title: Defiance Proposes 3X Leveraged Exposure on Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds and Crypto Stocks
contentSnippet: Defiance's prospectus to the SEC on Friday outlines 49 ETFs that would provide leveraged exposure to Bitcoin funds, crypto firms, and more.

title: After 30 Days Without Food, AI Protester Finally Quits Hunger Strike
contentSnippet: AI activist Guido Reichstadter ended his 30-day hunger strike outside Anthropic HQ.

title: Trump Tariff Stimmy? Here’s How Much Covid Stimulus Checks Are Worth Now If Invested in Bitcoin
contentSnippet: President Trump said this week that Americans could receive a cut of tariff revenue. Here's why it might be a good idea to invest those funds in Bitcoin.

title: We Tested the Best Free AI Image Editors—Here's What You'll Love and Hate
contentSnippet: AI image editing has moved from painful workflows to plain English prompts—here’s how today’s top free models stack up.

title: 仮想通貨強気相場を加速か？　トランプ米大統領が最大2000ドルの給付金を検討
contentSnippet: 米国のトランプ大統領が関税収入を基に最大2,000ドルの国民給付金を検討している。コロナ禍では給付金がビットコイン上昇を後押ししており仮想通貨市場への影響が注目される。

title: ビットコインマイニング大手MARA、BTC保有量が1兆円に迫る
contentSnippet: Maraが発表した9月の生産実績によると、218ブロックを獲得し前月比5%増を記録した。ビットコイン保有量は52,850BTCに達し、上場企業の中でストラテジーに次ぐ第2位の保有額。

title: ウォルマート傘下のワンペイ、仮想通貨取引機能を年内追加へ
contentSnippet: ウォルマートが過半数を所有するフィンテック企業ワンペイが年内にモバイルアプリで仮想通貨取引とカストディサービスを開始すると報じられた。
